name: Groppo
description:
{Warning}

This Game Is In Development And Still Needs Alot Of Work, Beware Game Only Has The Tutorial Level And The Game Isnt Even Fully Finished, Game Still Needs Polish And Story And More Levels, Game Is Incomplete, Fair Warning If You Are Looking For A Good Game Refrain From Downloading.

{Game Description}

This Platformer Game Starts Off With A Tutorial Teaching You The Controls The Game Will Over All Get Harder And Harder Which Makes The Game More And More Fun Each Time You Play It. The Game Is Based Off Games Like Portal But Instead Of A Portal Gun Its Now Turned Into A.. Sword... That Shoots... A Grappling Hook Rope??? Ehh..?

Anyways Hope You Enjoy The Game I Created!
